input: From all the users that the email is from 'gmail.com', What are their names?
context:
CREATE TABLE Users ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT NOT NULL, email TEXT NOT NULL);
 CREATE TABLE Orders (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, date DATE NOT NULL, user_id INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(id));
expected: SELECT name FROM Users u WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
